Big Chill Appliance Repair – Retro Style. Modern Performance. Expert Repair.

Your Big Chill appliance isn’t just a kitchen workhorse—it’s a statement piece. Known for its bold retro design, vibrant color options, and reliable modern engineering, Big Chill appliances offer a perfect blend of vintage charm and high-performance functionality. But when something goes wrong, you need more than a repair—you need a service that understands both the look and the mechanics of your luxury appliance.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we specialize in Big Chill appliance repair, offering precise, professional service that respects the beauty and complexity of your retro-modern kitchen.

🔧 Why Trust Zaricci with Your Big Chill Appliance?

  • ✅ Technicians Trained in Big Chill Systems: Our experts are familiar with every detail of Big Chill’s appliances—from classic fridges to modern pro ranges. We know how to preserve the style while restoring full functionality.
  • ✅ Authentic Big Chill Parts: We use manufacturer-approved components to ensure your appliance looks and works exactly as it was designed to. No off-brand parts, no compromises.
  • ✅ Fast, Flexible Scheduling: Appliance issues can throw off your entire routine. That’s why we offer same-day or next-day appointments whenever possible and always respect your time.
  • ✅ Upfront Pricing & Honest Service: Before any work begins, you’ll receive a clear and detailed estimate—no hidden fees, no unexpected charges. Just honest, professional service from start to finish.

🛠️ Big Chill Appliances We Repair

❄️ Big Chill Refrigerators

  • Cooling issues
  • Inconsistent temperature
  • Ice maker malfunctions
  • Door seal replacements
  • Noisy compressor or fan

🔥 Big Chill Ranges & Stoves

  • Burners won’t ignite
  • Oven won’t heat evenly
  • Faulty temperature control
  • Broiler malfunctions
  • Gas or electrical issues

🚿 Big Chill Dishwashers

  • Water not draining
  • Weak cleaning performance
  • Door not closing properly
  • Strange noises or error codes
  • Power or cycle malfunctions

Whether it’s a Retro, Classic, or Pro Series appliance, we bring your Big Chill unit back to life—without compromising its timeless aesthetic.

👨‍🔧 What Makes Zaricci Different?

Big Chill appliances stand out—and so should your service provider. At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we take a high-touch, detail-oriented approach to every repair. From protecting enamel finishes to fine-tuning performance, we combine expert craftsmanship with customer-first service.

When you chose Big Chill, you didn’t just buy an appliance—you invested in a timeless piece of kitchen art. Let Zaricci help protect that investment with service that honors both form and function.
